We do not list used turntables, please call for availability.
Most all used turntables come with either a new cartridge and stylus or new stylus.
New turntables also available. Stylus replacements for most cartrdiges in stock!

Web pricing are not updated every minute, store prices are.
Please call to verify the correct price and stock status.
